title: WHAT ABOUT TARIC?!
body: Every other champion has gotten a update so far, except Taric. When does TARIC get at least a visual update at least?

replies.body:
Riot Repertior [mentioned](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EABt8X1q-riotrepertoir-how-is-taric-and-the-rest-coming-along) recently that Taric is currently in the process of a rework - 

*Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.*

once again the day is saved thanks to

**Riot KateyKhaos!!!**

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GfEZmiuu,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2015-07-08T22:15:15.246+0000)
>
> once again the day is saved thanks to
> 
> **Riot KateyKhaos!!!**

*Powerpuff girl theme plays in the background*

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GfEZmiuu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-08T16:41:50.019+0000)
>
> Riot Repertior [mentioned](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EABt8X1q-riotrepertoir-how-is-taric-and-the-rest-coming-along) recently that Taric is currently in the process of a rework - 
> 
> *Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.*

Taric still has some "big projects" ahead of him....

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GfEZmiuu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-08T16:41:50.019+0000)
>
> Riot Repertior [mentioned](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EABt8X1q-riotrepertoir-how-is-taric-and-the-rest-coming-along) recently that Taric is currently in the process of a rework - 
> 
> *Taric's 90% or so done from the gameplay side actually. However, due to him needing new model, animations, vfx, sfx, etc., there are still a few big projects ahead of him. It probably won't be until late fall or winter that we reveal changes.*

what about poppy yorick or easier reworks like fiora darius

We've announced a Poppy rework. You can keep track of the updates [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule). I don't know much additional information, as I'm on the Skins team, not Champion Update.
What about Shen? when is he getting his gameplay update?
So, he'll be coming out this year? Look, that's all I needed to know!
The new Taric kit is ready. The art department though is still working on how he should look.
He needs to be sxc and classy a bit. I really like the drawing ive seen of him.
They want to make him the Paladin of LoL and since that is the class I've always mained in every game I'm really looking forward to it.
Thank you so much Riot KateyKhaos!! The timely response has really been great! Also I'm looking forward to this "rework" of his. :)
